org.hps.monitoring.subsys

Interface SystemStatistics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemStatisticsImpl

    public interface SystemStatistics
    This is an interface for a set of basic statistics about an online event processing system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSystemStatisticsListener(SystemStatisticsListener listener) 
      double getAverageEventsPerSecond()
      Get the average number of events per second in the session.
      double getAverageMegabytesPerSecond()
      Get the average Mb per second of the session, which is the total amount of data divided by the total time.
      double getBytesPerSecond()
      Get the immediate data rate which is the amount of data in bytes received in the current tick over the tim elapsed in the tick.
      long getBytesReceived()
      Get the number of bytes received in the current tick.
      double getEventsPerSecond()
      Get the immediate event rate which is the number of events received in the current tick over the time elapsed in the tick.
      long getEventsReceived()
      Get the number of events in the current tick.
      double getMegabytesPerSecond()
      Get the immediate data rate which is the amount of data in megabytes received in the current tick over the time elapsed in the tick.
      long getNominalTickLengthMillis()
      Get the nominal length of one tick in millis.
      long getStartTimeMillis()
      Get the Unix start time of the session.
      long getStopTimeMillis()
      Get the Unix stop time of the session.
      long getTickElapsedMillis()
      Get the number of milliseconds since the last tick.
      long getTickEndTimeMillis()
      Get the end of the tick in Unix time (milliseconds since the epoch).
      long getTotalElapsedMillis()
      Get the number of millis since the session started.
      long getTotalEvents()
      Get the total number of events processed thusfar.
      double getTotalMegabytes()
      Get the total number of megabytes of data received thusfar.
      void printSession(PrintStream ps)
      Print session statistics.
      void printTick(PrintStream ps)
      Print tick statistics.
      void setNominalTickLengthMillis(long tickLengthMillis)
      Set the desired timer tick length in millis.
      void start()
      Start the timer thread for accumulating statistics.
      void stop()
      Stop the timer thread for accumulating statistics.
      void update(int size)
      Update the statistics by incrementing the event count by one and then adding size to the number of bytes received.

    • Method Detail

      • setNominalTickLengthMillis

        void setNominalTickLengthMillis(long tickLengthMillis)
        Set the desired timer tick length in millis.
        Parameters:
        tickLengthMillis - The desired tick length in millis.

      • getNominalTickLengthMillis

        long getNominalTickLengthMillis()
        Get the nominal length of one tick in millis. Actual tick lengths lengths may vary slightly.
        Returns:
        The nominal tick length in millis.

      • getTickEndTimeMillis

        long getTickEndTimeMillis()
        Get the end of the tick in Unix time (milliseconds since the epoch).
        Returns:
        The tick end in Unix time.

      • start

        void start()
        Start the timer thread for accumulating statistics.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop the timer thread for accumulating statistics.

      • update

        void update(int size)
        Update the statistics by incrementing the event count by one and then adding size to the number of bytes received.
        Parameters:
        size - The number of bytes received.

      • getTotalElapsedMillis

        long getTotalElapsedMillis()
        Get the number of millis since the session started.
        Returns:
        The number of millis since session start.

      • getStartTimeMillis

        long getStartTimeMillis()
        Get the Unix start time of the session.
        Returns:
        The start time in millis.

      • getStopTimeMillis

        long getStopTimeMillis()
        Get the Unix stop time of the session.
        Returns:
        The stop time in millis.

      • getEventsReceived

        long getEventsReceived()
        Get the number of events in the current tick.
        Returns:
        The number of events in the current tick.

      • getTotalEvents

        long getTotalEvents()
        Get the total number of events processed thusfar.
        Returns:
        The total number of events processed so far.

      • getAverageEventsPerSecond

        double getAverageEventsPerSecond()
        Get the average number of events per second in the session. It simply divides the number of events by the session time.
        Returns:
        The average events per second.

      • getBytesReceived

        long getBytesReceived()
        Get the number of bytes received in the current tick.
        Returns:
        The number of bytes received in the tick.

      • getTotalMegabytes

        double getTotalMegabytes()
        Get the total number of megabytes of data received thusfar.
        Returns:
        The amount of data in megabytes received in the session.

      • getAverageMegabytesPerSecond

        double getAverageMegabytesPerSecond()
        Get the average Mb per second of the session, which is the total amount of data divided by the total time.
        Returns:
        The average megabytes per second.

      • getEventsPerSecond

        double getEventsPerSecond()
        Get the immediate event rate which is the number of events received in the current tick over the time elapsed in the tick.
        Returns:
        The event rate in [events/second].

      • getBytesPerSecond

        double getBytesPerSecond()
        Get the immediate data rate which is the amount of data in bytes received in the current tick over the tim elapsed in the tick.
        Returns:
        The data rate in [bytes/second].

      • getMegabytesPerSecond

        double getMegabytesPerSecond()
        Get the immediate data rate which is the amount of data in megabytes received in the current tick over the time elapsed in the tick.
        Returns:
        The data rate in [bytes/second].

      • getTickElapsedMillis

        long getTickElapsedMillis()
        Get the number of milliseconds since the last tick.
        Returns:
        The number of millis elapsed in the current tick.

      • printSession

        void printSession(PrintStream ps)
        Print session statistics.
        Parameters:
        ps - The PrintStream for display.

      • printTick

        void printTick(PrintStream ps)
        Print tick statistics.
        Parameters:
        ps - The PrintStream for display.
